agentData.mission: Draft a comprehensive deep-report integrating the literature review and synthesis: include Executive Summary, Background/Theory for each domain, Methods (for proposed studies), Synthesis of empirical findings, Discussion (implications for theory and practice), Proposed Experiments, Limitations, and Recommended next steps. Ensure proper citations and include the annotated bibliography and timeline as appendices.

results.message: Document not emitted: missing claim/intake fields (claim text is required).
